Lakes380CoreDepthTools 0.18.0
  • Reference
  • Changelog

    Convert depths from hyperspectral imaging

    hsi_to_dblf.Rd

    Convert depths from hyperspectral imaging

    hsi_to_dblf(corename, cm, extraAllowedBottom = 1)

    Arguments

    corename

    a vector of corenames

    cm

    a vector of corresponding depths that matches the length of corenames

    extraAllowedBottom

    how many cm below the bottom of the ROI are allowed (converted to bottom of ROI) (default = 1)

    Value

    depth below lake floor in cm

    Examples

    
hsi_to_dblf("L380_DUNCA3_LC4U_2",0:30)
#>              corename coreSectionDepth  dblf topSource botSource
#> 1  L380_DUNCA3_LC4U_2                0  89.5   non-HSI   non-HSI
#> 2  L380_DUNCA3_LC4U_2                1  90.5   non-HSI   non-HSI
#> 3  L380_DUNCA3_LC4U_2                2  91.5   non-HSI   non-HSI
#> 4  L380_DUNCA3_LC4U_2                3  92.5   non-HSI   non-HSI
#> 5  L380_DUNCA3_LC4U_2                4  93.5   non-HSI   non-HSI
